
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2024-02-16 22:59:06.034819                #
######################################


#leader_trait_adaptable_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_adaptable }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2 } }
    }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_army_veteran }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_army_veteran_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_industrialist_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_trait_ruler_industrialist_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = trait_ruler_industrialist }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = trait_ruler_industrialist_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}

        hidden_effect = {

        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = subclass_scientist_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_cartographer }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }

        }
    }

    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_particles_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = subclass_scientist_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_expertise_particles }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_expertise_particles_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_particles_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_particles_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_particles_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_expertise_particles_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_scientist_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
        }
    }
}
